abstract: |
  This notebook continues the analysis described in **RNA redistribution driven by alterations in transcription during early embryogenesis of rainbow trout**. It focuses on the post-processing of ligand–receptor candidates in *Oncorhynchus mykiss* (trout) embryos. It presents the second part of the ligand–receptor interaction analysis. Candidate ligand–receptor pairs between extreme vegetal and extreme animal poles are ranked based on evidence from external databases. The final interactome and associated metadata are exported as ranked lists, enabling exploration of intercellular signaling events in early development. 
  This analysis is adapted from the original `script_v14_DanioTalk LR finder for DE genes.R` available at [DanioTalk GitHub](https://github.com/DanioTalk/daniotalk/tree/master/Scripts).

# **load Gene Aliases and Build Lookup Helpers**
```{r}
print("Loading gene aliases...")

# Load alias mapping from file
gene_map = read.delim("aliases.txt", header = FALSE, col.names = c("Symbol", "Alias")) %>%
  tibble() %>%
  mutate(across(where(is.character), tolower))

# Unique set of valid gene symbols
GENE_SET = gene_map$Symbol %>% unique()

# Create alias dictionary: Alias -> Symbol
ALIAS_DICT = gene_map %>% filter(Alias != "")
ALIAS_DICT = setNames(as.character(ALIAS_DICT$Symbol), as.character(ALIAS_DICT$Alias))

# Helper: remove transcript suffix (e.g., .1, .2) if needed
filterSplicing = function(g) {
  if ((g %in% GENE_SET) | (g %in% names(ALIAS_DICT))) return(g)
  result = stringr::str_split(g, "\\.") %>% unlist() %>% .[[1]]
  return(result)
}

# Remove NA aliases for cleaner mapping
gene_map = gene_map %>% filter(!is.na(Alias))

# Helper: alias replacement
check_in_map = function(x) {
  if (x %in% GENE_SET) {
    return(x)
  } else if (x %in% names(ALIAS_DICT)) {
    return(ALIAS_DICT[x])
  } else {
    return(x)
  }
}
```

# **Load and Preprocess Differential Expression Data**
```{r}
print("Loading data... Removing (1 of many).X")

# Load expression data and clean up gene names and text formatting
data = readxl::read_excel(Input_filename)  %>%
  filter(`P-value` < P_value_cutoff) %>%
  mutate(across(where(is.character), tolower)) %>%
  mutate(across(where(is.character), ~ str_replace(.x, "\\(1 of many\\)", ""))) %>%
  mutate(Gene = purrr::map_chr(Gene, filterSplicing)) %>%
  mutate(across(where(is.character), ~ str_trim(.x) %>% tolower()))

print("Updating gene names")
data$Gene = data$Gene %>% purrr::map_chr(check_in_map) %>% tolower()
```

# **Add Human Orthologs and Drug Information**
```{r}
print("Adding human orthologue gene information...")

# Load ortholog table
human = read_tsv("human_orthos.txt", col_names = FALSE)
colnames(human) = c("ZFIN_ID", "ZFIN_SYMBOL", "ZFIN_NAME", "HUMAN_SYMBOL")

# Download drug interaction data if not present
if (!file.exists("drug.target.interaction.tsv.gz")) {
  print("Downloading drug data...")
  download.file("https://unmtid-shinyapps.net/download/DrugCentral/2021_09_01/drug.target.interaction.tsv.gz", "drug.target.interaction.tsv.gz")
}

# Process drug interaction data
drugs = read_tsv("drug.target.interaction.tsv.gz") %>%
  tibble() %>%
  mutate(GENE = strsplit(GENE, split = "|", fixed = TRUE)) %>%
  unnest(GENE) %>%
  distinct() %>%
  select(GENE, DRUG_NAME) %>%
  mutate(GENE = tolower(GENE)) %>%
  group_by(GENE) %>%
  summarize(DRUG_NAME = paste(DRUG_NAME, collapse = ",")) %>%
  ungroup()

# Merge drug and human orthologs
data = data %>% left_join(drugs, by = c("Gene" = "GENE"))

human = human %>%
  select(ZFIN_SYMBOL, HUMAN_SYMBOL) %>%
  distinct() %>%
  mutate_all( ~ .x %>% textclean::strip(digit.remove = F, apostrophe.remove = F))

data = data %>%
  left_join(human, by = c("Gene" = "ZFIN_SYMBOL")) %>%
  plyr::rename(., c("HUMAN_SYMBOL" = "Human ortholog"))

genes = data$Gene %>% unique()
```

# **Annotate Zebrafish GO Terms**
```{r}
# Download ZFIN GO annotation if missing
if (!file.exists("zfin.gaf.gz")) {
  download.file("http://current.geneontology.org/annotations/zfin.gaf.gz", "zfin.gaf.gz")
}

# Parse and format ZFIN GO terms
gos_zfin = read_tsv("zfin.gaf.gz", comment = "!") %>%
  select(1:5) %>%
  setNames(c("uniprot", "code", "Gene", "1", "GO")) %>%
  select(Gene, GO) %>%
  mutate(Gene = tolower(Gene)) %>%
  mutate(Gene = ifelse(Gene %in% names(gene_map), gene_map[Gene], Gene)) %>%
  mutate(Type = bo_map[GO]) %>%
  select(Gene, Type) %>%
  group_by(Gene) %>% summarise(Type = paste(unique(Type), collapse = ";")) %>%
  ungroup()

# Normalize gene names and convert GO terms to uppercase
gos_zfin$Gene = map_chr(gos_zfin$Gene, check_in_map)
gos_zfin$Type = map_chr(gos_zfin$Type, toupper)
gos_map = setNames(gos_zfin$Type, gos_zfin$Gene)
```

# **Annotate Human GO Terms**
```{r}
# Download human GO annotation if missing
if (!file.exists("goa_human.gaf.gz")) {
  download.file("http://geneontology.org/gene-associations/goa_human.gaf.gz", "goa_human.gaf.gz")
}

# Process human GO annotations
gos_human = read_tsv("goa_human.gaf.gz", comment = "!") %>%
  select(1:5) %>%
  setNames(c("uniprot", "code", "Gene", "1", "GO")) %>%
  select(Gene, GO) %>%
  mutate(Gene = tolower(Gene)) %>%
  mutate(Gene = ifelse(Gene %in% names(gene_map), gene_map[Gene], Gene)) %>%
  mutate(Type = bo_map[GO]) %>%
  select(Gene, Type) %>%
  group_by(Gene) %>%
  summarise(Type = paste(unique(Type), collapse = ";")) %>%
  ungroup()

gos_human$Type = map_chr(gos_human$Type, toupper)
```

# **Load Ligand-Receptor Database and Join with DE Data**
```{r}
print("Loading database...")

# Load ligand-receptor pairs and prepare for merging
database = read_csv("Database.csv") %>%
  mutate(across(where(is.character), tolower))

print("Joining data onto database. Computing pairs...")

# Find ligand-receptor matches in dataset
joined = database %>%
  filter(ZFIN_SYMBOL_LIG %in% data$Gene, ZFIN_SYMBOL_REC %in% data$Gene) %>%
  inner_join(data, by = c("ZFIN_SYMBOL_LIG" = "Gene"), keep = TRUE) %>%
  inner_join(data, by = c("ZFIN_SYMBOL_REC" = "Gene"), keep = TRUE, suffix = c(".lig", ".rec"))
```

# **Assign Scores and Compute Ranking Metrics**
```{r}
# Assign scoring based on known databases and experimental validation
final = final %>%
  mutate(
    `Human LR pair score` = case_when(
      `CellTalkDB` == "yes" | `Ramilowski` == "yes" | `CellPhoneDB` == "yes" | `CellChat` == "yes" |
        !is.na(CellChat_Dimer_or_Complex) | !is.na(CellPhoneDB_Dimer_or_Complex) ~ 500,
      `IID_EVIDENCE` %in% c("exp", "exp|pred", "exp|ortho", "exp|ortho|pred") ~ 400,
      `CellCellInteractions` == "yes" | `IID_EVIDENCE` %in% c("pred", "ortho|pred", "ortho") ~ 250,
      TRUE ~ 0
    )
  )

# Calculate ranking metrics
## ADDED RANKS 10-11-2022
# Ranking 1
final = final %>%
  mutate(
    `ScoreForRank1` = ifelse(
      is.na(PHYSICAL_INTERACTION_SCORE) | PHYSICAL_INTERACTION_SCORE < 200,
      `Human LR pair score`,
      PHYSICAL_INTERACTION_SCORE
    ),
    `ScoreForRank2` = FC.lig * FC.rec * ScoreForRank1,
    `ScoreForRank3` = FC.lig * FC.rec * `Human LR pair score`
  )

# Assign actual ranks
final = final %>% mutate(
  Ranking1 = dense_rank(desc(ScoreForRank1)),
  Ranking2 = dense_rank(desc(ScoreForRank2)),
  Ranking3 = dense_rank(desc(ScoreForRank3))
) %>% dplyr::select(-c(`Human LR pair score`)) %>%
  dplyr::select(
    `Cell.type.lig`,
    `Cell.type.rec`,
    `Gene.lig`,
    `Gene.rec`,
    `FC.lig`,
    `FC.rec`,
    `P-value.lig`,
    `P-value.rec`,
    `Ranking1`,
    `Ranking2`,
    `Ranking3`,
    `PHYSICAL_INTERACTION_SCORE`,
    `CellCellInteractions`,
    `CellChat`,
    `CellChat_Dimer_or_Complex`,
    `CellPhoneDB`,
    `CellPhoneDB_Dimer_or_Complex`,
    `CellTalkDB`,
    `IID_EVIDENCE`,
    `Ramilowski`,
    `DRUG_NAME.lig`,
    `HUMAN_SYMBOL_LIG`,
    `ConservationScore_LIG`,
    `Algorithms_LIG`,
    `HUMAN_GENE_ID_LIG`,
    `DRUG_NAME.rec`,
    `HUMAN_SYMBOL_REC`,
    `ConservationScore_REC`,
    `Algorithms_REC`,
    `HUMAN_GENE_ID_REC`,
    `ZFIN_Matrisome_annotation_LIG`,
    `ZFIN GO Type.lig`,
    `Human GO Type.lig`,
    `Human_Matrisome_annotation_LIG`,
    `Ligand_type`,
    `CellChat_annotation`,
    `ZFIN_Matrisome_annotation_REC`,
    `ZFIN GO Type.rec`,
    `Human GO Type.rec`,
    `Human_Matrisome_annotation_REC`,
    `ScoreForRank1`,

  ) %>% mutate(

    HUMAN_SYMBOL_REC = toupper(HUMAN_SYMBOL_REC)
  )

# Save filtered/unfiltered interactome
final_unfiltered = final
final_filtered = final_unfiltered %>% filter(FC.lig > FC_MIN_cutoff, FC.rec > FC_MIN_cutoff)

final_name = "Resulting-ligand-receptor-pairs.xlsx"
```

# **Annotate Ligand/Receptor Metadata and Classify**
```{r}
# Prepare metadata from database for ligands and receptors
tmp = database %>% select(matches("SYMBOL"), matches("Algorithms"), matches("Conservation"))
tmp1 = tmp %>% select(ZFIN_SYMBOL_LIG, Algorithms_LIG, ConservationScore_LIG)
tmp2 = tmp %>% select(ZFIN_SYMBOL_REC, Algorithms_REC, ConservationScore_REC)

colnames(tmp1) = c("Symbol", "Algorithms", "ConservationScore")
colnames(tmp2) = c("Symbol", "Algorithms", "ConservationScore")

# Combine metadata into a single frame
genes_metadata = rbind(tmp1, tmp2)

# Annotate each gene with cell-type presence and assign ligand/receptor classification
genes_with_cell = data %>%
  mutate(
    `Gene Type` = case_when(
      Gene %in% database$ZFIN_SYMBOL_LIG ~ "Ligand",
      Gene %in% database$ZFIN_SYMBOL_REC ~ "Receptor",
      TRUE ~ "Not in db"
    ),
    # Determine plasma detection source (experiment/prediction)
    `Plasma` = case_when(
      Gene %in% plasma_pred$Symbol & Gene %in% plasma_exp$Symbol ~ "Plasma Exp & Pred",
      Gene %in% plasma_pred$Symbol ~ "Plasma Pred",
      Gene %in% plasma_exp$Symbol ~ "Plasma Exp",
      TRUE ~ "None"
    ),
    # Only ligands can be plasma-annotated
    `Plasma` = ifelse(`Gene Type` == "Ligand", `Plasma`, NA)
  ) %>%
  filter(`Gene Type` != "Not in db") %>%
  inner_join(genes_metadata, by = c("Gene" = "Symbol")) %>%
  unique()
```

# **Annotate Ligand/Receptor Types Using GO Terms**
```{r}
print("Adding information about Ligand/Receptor type...")

# Use GO term mappings to classify gene function
final = genes_with_cell %>%
  mutate(
    `Ligand Type` = ifelse(Gene %in% names(gos_map) & `Gene Type` == "Ligand", gos_map[Gene], NA),
    `Receptor Type` = ifelse(Gene %in% names(gos_map) & `Gene Type` == "Receptor", gos_map[Gene], NA),
    `Human ortholog` = toupper(`Human ortholog`)
  ) %>% unique()

# Save list with GO annotations
final_name_genes = "Resulting-ligand-receptor-list-plasma-and-GO.xlsx"
writexl::write_xlsx(
  final %>%
    select(-`Ligand Type`, -`Receptor Type`) %>%
    rename(`ZFIN GO` = `ZFIN GO Type`, `Human GO` = `Human GO Type`),
  final_name_genes
)
```

# **Save Ligand/Receptor Lists for Each Cell Type**
```{r}
ligands_and_receptors = "Resulting-ligands-receptors-each-cell.xlsx"

openxlsx::write.xlsx(df_list_unfiltered, ligands_and_receptors_unfiltered)
```
